content: BTW, @Ryan Levick, I maybe didn't make this clear, but the best way to leave messages for lang team is also to post regular updates on rust-lang/lang-team#21. We review that during every triage meeting. I am catching up on Zulip pings but the last few weeks have been extra crazy even for me, and I don't anticipate that slowing down in particular for a bit. =) I'm glad you all posted the RFC, though!!
(The issue isn't meant for general discussion, but posting updates for us to check in and on and give a response to is perfect.)
Awesome! Thanks I'll make sure this issue is kept up to date.
